name: The Asteroid Field
description:
CUTTING EDGE CRT SCREEN AND 256 MB OF RAM FOR MAXIMUM BLEEDING EDGE GRAPHICS AND GAMING SMOOTHNESS.

A throw-back to the dawn of video games, with the modern twist with some minor physics. 

YOUR GOAL IS SIMPLE, SURVIVE.

Avoid asteroids as long as possible to achieve the high-score!

Browser version has been removed due to it being too glitchy, might fix this at a later date.
